note.p: Daughter of Alexander Smith, a Scottish banker, and his wife Marion Watson. Married CD’s publisher John Murray (1808–92) in 1847.
Scotland old parish registers births 685/2 140 152 St Cuthbert’s, Edinburgh (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 18 October 2022)
Scotland old parish registers marriages 685/1 680 360 Edinburgh (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 18 October 2022)
